mapper.select: select a.menu_id as menu_id, a.menu_name as menu_name, a.menu_level as menu_level, b.menu_name as father_menu, form_name as context_form from (menu_info as a left join menu_info as b on a.father_menu = b.menu_id) left join form_info on a.context_form = form_id where a.menu_name like concat('%', #{menu_name}, '%');

select menu_id, menu_name, menu_level, (select menu_name from menu_info where father_menu = menu_info.menu_id) as father_menu, (select form_name from form_info where context_form = form_info.form_id) as context_form from menu_info where menu_id = #{menu_id};
